## utils.aria.setState() function

Sets the state or property of an element. Copied from Closure's goog.a11y.aria

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function setState(element: Element, stateName: State, value: string | boolean | number | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM node where we set state. |
|  stateName | State | State attribute being set. Automatically adds prefix 'aria-' to the state name if the attribute is not an extra attribute. |
|  value | string \| boolean \| number \| string\[\] | Value for the state attribute. |

**Returns:**

void
